overview:
B2B alibaba clone PHP Script Introduction

B2B Script is very powerful and effective solution to launch your own Global B2B Trading Portal. B2B Script has high end features to provide a very strong foundation to your trading portal. Script offers great earning potential. B2B Script is perfect to launch your own top quality trading portal. It is a wonderful script with quality features like: • Product Catalog feature • Company Profiles • Sell Offer feature • Buy Offer feature • Complete internal messaging system • Three membership levels : Gold, Silver and Bronze • Script parameters are highly configurable through script admin panel. • And of course huge earning potential Key Applications of the B2B Script • Run dedicated trading portal site to tap the great earning opportunity that this script offers • Run as free service to attract more visitors and member to your website • You can also use this script as advertising platform for your products / other sites • Can be used as interface of your import/export business • Online platform for finding global trading partners Detailed Features List : • Multilevel categories for convenient browsing • Product Catalog • Company profiles • Category ordering can be defined by admin or set to alphabetic • Sell Offers • Buy Offers • Image gallery for products, sell offers and buy offers • Logo uploading for company profiles • Trade alerts in email • Three membership levels : Gold, Silver and Bronze

Visit on this site http://b2b-alibaba-clone.com/index.html Fore Features http://b2b-alibaba-clone.com/features.html Fore Demo http://b2b-alibaba-clone.com/demo.html Fore Pricing http://b2b-alibaba-clone.com/prize.html Other Products http://b2b-alibaba-clone.com/other_products.html
